name: Grandma's Dish
description:
This is the game created for Low Effort Game Jam

Author: xuanan6230 (art & music) and drunkbug (program).

It's our first time game jam, it's fun :)

How to play:

- Drag & drop food to characters

- You hate broccoli, dog loves broccoli

- Don't make grandma sad

- Finish the dish

You lose 1 happniess if you eat broccoli, your grandma lose 1 happniess if she finds you throw food on the desk, feed the dog, or not eating food.
